translations: v.用沥青涂抹，用柏油铺盖（tar的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 沥青；煤焦油沥青；硬煤沥青

sentences.sentence: Sailors worked On tarring riggings and oiling cargorunners etc.
sentences.translation: 水手工作于为支索、后支索和索具涂黑铅油脂。

sentences.sentence: We could have been drinking beer and tarring the roof of one of our own houses.
sentences.translation: 我们就像在涂刷自己家的房顶一样，我们可以创造一切。

sentences.sentence: We could have been tarring the roof of one of our own house, we were the Lords of all creation.
sentences.translation: 我们就像在涂刷自己家的房顶一样，我们可以创造一切。
